q: '' Looking for a spark, 76ers coach Eddie Jordan benched power forward Elton Brand and paired rookie Jrue Holiday in the backcourt with Allen Iverson . Jordan's move worked: Jrue Holiday had 15 points, seven rebounds and six assists. He just put us in a good rhythm tonight and had us flowing, Allen Iverson said. Elton Brand , who was previously benched in some fourth quarters, said it was hard to complain about his role after a victory. the Fiat chief backing away from his previous remarks in a telephone conversation with labour minister Maurizio Sacconi . According to the ministry, Sergio Marchionne explained that he spoke in`` hypothetical'' terms and that nothing was decided, with no reference about a new location for the company's leadership for today or tomorrow. In October, Sergio Marchionne ignited controversy when he said that`` Fiat would be better off if it eliminated Italy''. him in public and private. George Osborne described Andy Coulson as`` an incredibly talented, dedicated and patriotic servant of this country''. David Cameron said he was saddened by the departure, feeling his communications director was being punished twice for the same offence. This is all about the past. It has gone on and on and I can understand why he feels the pressure of that.`` I choose to judge him by the work he has done for me, for the government and for the country. He has run the Downing Street press office in a very straightforward professional and competent way. He said he compared Andy Coulson 's regime with`` the days of dodgy dossiers, Alastair Campbell , Damian McBride and all that nonsense we had from the past government''. the Betty White House and Congress. On Dec. 10, Sen. Bernie Sanders , an independent, took the floor of the Senate and didn't relinquish it for 8 1/2 hours. His words are being assembled into a book entitled The Speech: A Historic Filibuster on Corporate Greed and the Decline of Our Middle Class. The book's publisher, Nation Books, says millions followed the speech online, crashing the Senate server. A print book is due out next month. An electronic book will be published Jan. 28.
